text: The following lists events that happened during 2007 in the Republic of Fiji. ==Incumbents== *President: Josefa Iloilo (starting January 4) along with Frank Bainimarama *Prime Minister: Jona Senilagakali (until January 4), Frank Bainimarama (starting January 4) ==Events== ===January=== * January 4 - Commodore Frank Bainimarama, who had carried out a military coup on 5 December, restores the deposed President Ratu Josefa Iloilo to office. * January 4 - President Iloilo appoints Bainimarama as Prime Minister of Fiji. ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Fiji Category:2000s in Fiji Fiji Fiji
title: 2007 in Fiji
